mapper.select: SELECT t3.CALENDAR_ID_ calendarId, t3.COURSE_CODE_ courseCode, t4.NAME_ courseName, t3.EXAM_DATE_ examDate, t3.EXAM_START_TIME_ examStartTime, t3.EXAM_END_TIME_ examEndTime, t1.ROOM_ID_ roomId, t1.ROOM_NAME_ roomName, t2.TEACHING_CLASS_CODE_ teachingClassCode, t2.TEACHING_CLASS_NAME_ teachingClassName, t2.STUDENT_CODE_ studentCode, t5.NAME_ studentName, t5.FACULTY_ faculty, t3.ID_ examInfoId FROM graduate_exam_room_t t1 LEFT JOIN graduate_exam_student_t t2 ON t1.ID_ = t2.EXAM_ROOM_ID_ LEFT JOIN graduate_exam_info_t t3 ON t2.EXAM_INFO_ID_ = t3.ID_ LEFT JOIN course_t t4 on t3.COURSE_CODE_ = t4.CODE_ left join student_t t5 on t5.STUDENT_CODE_ = t2.STUDENT_CODE_ WHERE t1.ID_ = #{examRoomId} and t2.EXAM_SITUATION_ = 1 and t2.EXAM_INFO_ID_ = #{examInfoId} ORDER BY t3.COURSE_CODE_ asc ,t2.TEACHING_CLASS_CODE_ asc

select STUDENT_CODE_ studentCode, NAME_ studentName from student_t
and ( STUDENT_CODE_ like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or NAME_ like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))

update.foreach: UPDATE graduate_exam_student_t set REMARK_ = #{aduitOpinions} where ID_ = (SELECT t.ID_ FROM (SELECT t1.ID_ FROM graduate_exam_info_t t2 left join graduate_exam_student_t t1 on t1.EXAM_INFO_ID_ = t2.ID_ where t2.CALENDAR_ID_ = #{item.calendarId} and t2.COURSE_CODE_ = #{item.courseCode} and t1.EXAM_SITUATION_ = 1 and t2.EXAM_TYPE_ = 1 and t1.STUDENT_CODE_ = #{item.studentCode}) t)

mapper.select:
select t1.* from graduate_exam_info_t t2 left join graduate_exam_student_t t1 on t1.EXAM_INFO_ID_ = t2.ID_ where
(t2.COURSE_CODE_ = #{item.courseCode} and t1.STUDENT_CODE_ = #{item.studentCode} )
and t2.EXAM_TYPE_ = 1 and t2.CALENDAR_ID_ = #{calendarId} and t1.EXAM_SITUATION_ = 1

select t1.STUDENT_CODE_ studentCode,t1.EXAM_INFO_ID_ examInfoId,t2.ROOM_ID_ roomId,t2.ROOM_NAME_ roomName from graduate_exam_student_t t1 left join graduate_exam_room_t t2 on t1.EXAM_ROOM_ID_ = t2.ID_ where t1.EXAM_SITUATION_ = 1 and t1.EXAM_ROOM_ID_ in
#{examRoomId}

select t1.STUDENT_CODE_ studentCode,t1.EXAM_INFO_ID_ examInfoId,t2.ROOM_ID_ roomId,t2.ROOM_NAME_ roomName from graduate_exam_student_t t1 left join graduate_exam_room_t t2 on t1.EXAM_ROOM_ID_ = t2.ID_ where t1.ID_ in
#{id}

select t1.TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ teachingClassId,t1.NUMBER_ studentNumber,t2.TEACHER_CODE_ teacherCode,t2.TEACHER_NAME_ teacherName from (SELECT TEACHING_CLASS_ID_,COUNT(ID_) NUMBER_ FROM graduate_exam_student_t where EXAM_INFO_ID_ = #{examInfoId} and EXAM_ROOM_ID_ = #{examRoomId} and EXAM_SITUATION_ = 1 GROUP BY TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ ) t1 LEFT JOIN teaching_class_teacher_t t2 on t1.TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ = t2.TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ where t2.TYPE_ = 0

select CALENDAR_ID_ calendarId,STUDENT_ID_ studentCode,COURSE_CODE_ courseCode,TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ teachingClassId from score_student_result_t where CALENDAR_ID_ = #{calendarId} and STUDENT_ID_ = #{studentCode} and COURSE_CODE_ = #{courseCode} and IS_PASS_ = 0 and RELEASE_TYPE_ = 1

update.foreach: update score_student_result_t SET REMARK_PK_ = #{aduitOpinions} where CALENDAR_ID_ = #{item.calendarId} and COURSE_CODE_ = #{item.courseCode} and STUDENT_ID_ = #{item.studentCode} and TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ = #{item.teachingClassId}

mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from score_student_result_t where CALENDAR_ID_ =#{calendarId} and STUDENT_ID_ =#{studentCode} and COURSE_CODE_ =#{courseCode} and RELEASE_TYPE_ = 1
